item.description:
Second Meeting of 2009 Set for 7 PM at St. Mark's in Dorchester

The Greater Boston Chapter of the Fatherhood Coalition will hold its second meeting of 2009 on Monday, April 24 at 7PM at St Markâ€™s church hall, 20 Roseland Street (at 1725 Dorchester Avenue), Dorchester. For more information, please call 617-723-3237 or Joe at 857 350-0575. The Coalition, advocating for men, fathers and their children since 1994, will present the WCVB-TV Chronicle program 'Out of Order' which originally aired in February, 2000.

We are a chapter of the state-wide The Fatherhood Coalition: www.fatherhoodcoalition.org.

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition April Meetup
